mapper.insert: insert into game_meun_info (menuid, menuname, icon, url) values (#{menuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert all
into game_meun_info (menuid, menuname, icon, url) values (#{item.menuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.menuname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.url, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select 1 from dual
mapper.delete: delete from game_meun_info where 1=1 and menuid = #{0}
mapper.update:
update game_meun_info
menuname = #{menuname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1 and menuid = #{menuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
